text: The 1954 Montana State Bobcats football team was an American football team that represented Montana State University in the Rocky Mountain Conference (RMC) during the 1954 college football season. In its third season under head coach Tony Storti, the team compiled an 8–1 record (6–0 against RMC opponents) and won the Rocky Mountain Conference championship. ==Schedule== ==References== Montana State Category:Montana State Bobcats football seasons Category:Rocky Mountain Athletic Conference football champion seasons Montana State Bobcats football
title: 1954 Montana State Bobcats football team
